question: Assess the impact of artificial insemination and selective breeding on the genetic diversity of a population.

sample_answer.full_answer: Artificial insemination and selective breeding can have a significant impact on the genetic diversity of a population (1 mark). By selecting for desirable traits, these technologies can reduce the frequency of other alleles in the population, leading to a decrease in genetic diversity (2 marks). This can make the population more susceptible to disease and other environmental changes (2 marks).

marking_criteria.criteria: States that artificial insemination and selective breeding can impact genetic diversity.
Explains how these technologies can decrease genetic diversity.
Explains the consequences of decreased genetic diversity.
